metadata.title: USN-5999-1 -- trim-newlines vulnerability
metadata.description: It was discovered that trim-newlines incorrectly handled certain inputs. If a user or an automated system were tricked into opening a specially crafted input file, a remote attacker could possibly use this issue to cause a denial of service. (CVE-2021-33623)  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-5999-1` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  node-trim-newlines - 1.0.0-1ubuntu0.18.04.1 No subscription required
